title: Advertisement, "Memphis (condominiums):  New York Times Advertisement", June 23, 1985
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description: A cartoon-like sketch of the Memphis (condominiums) downtown building is placed on the diagonal, upper right to lower left, in the center of the page. The accompanying five lines of type, in addition to Memphis [logo]/ downtown, are enclosed within a bordered rectangle superimposed on the right edge of the building. A cloud-like smudge is centered near the bottom edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Advertisement, "Memphis (condominiums):  New York Times Advertisement", June 23, 1985.
June 23, 1985. Offset lithography. Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-122.
